name: Cobe The Gallery
description:
Sit back, relax and enjoy.
Train your brain and unwind your mind.

Cobe The Gallery is an elegant and beautiful puzzle game with engaging atmosphere.
Easy to pickup for everyone: solve each puzzle with few swipes of your finger.

Players love it:

►5/5
Great! by SimplerMan
Great challenging game!
►5/5
Wonderful game by Grandpippitypoppity
This game definitely deserves more reviews. This app is calming and very well made. Also, unlike many other relaxation-oriented apps, the puzzles are actually entertaining. 5 stars.
►5/5
Great game by NotWifeyMaterial
Really fun and challenging. Will definitely assist with memory and problem solving.

Relax your body and walk into quite gallery.
Raise your mind and solve stack of puzzles made of colorful cubes.
Enjoy smooth and soft piano and subtle animation of each object.

► FREE
► 81 unique and challenging puzzles
► Subtle and calming soundtrack (best experienced with headphones)
► Stunning graphic with dynamic shadows and eye-catching colors
► Game Center
► iCloudSync
